values: 使直立；直立；竖放；起立；站立；站着；使站立；站起来；位于（某处）；处于；位于；坐落于；处于特定状态；高度为；停；停滞；抵抗；抵御；承受；经得起；忍受；当选；参加竞选；赞助；支付费用；摆摊；设置展位；维持立场；保持意见；持某种态度
立场；观点；看法；态度；捍卫；抵抗；保卫；停止；停留；停顿；站立的位置；（建房等用的）地皮；地块；货摊；售货亭；摊位；舞台；高台；架；架子；展位；看台；（树木的）一片；一丛；一簇；一群

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 站立；坚持不变；坐落于（stand的ing形式）
立场；姿态；位置；准备击球姿势
机架；竖立的东西；煤柱；采伐残留木
（戏院中或交通工具中的）站立看客；站票观众

word_mean_info__list.difference: 指对看法有分歧的问题所表示较冷静和节制的态度，常常是经认真考虑后决定的。
普通用词，指对于事情的看法和采取的行动，多带不很显确或不便说明的感情色彩。
常指某人对某一问题的看法或立场，有时含个人感情色彩。
通常用过去分词作表语，指某城镇、乡村或某物等的地理位置与环境的关系，即在何处。
多指建筑物等被想象为主体的物体立于某处。
最常用词，不及物，指国家、城镇、道路、湖海等所处的位置。
指因具有一定实力、权力或能力而能忍受某种情况。
指以自我克制的态度，对待令人反感或厌恶的东西，含默认宽容意味。
口语用词，常可与hear换用，但前者侧重指经受得起，后者强调容忍，是普通用语。
书面用词，指长时间忍受痛苦和不幸，着重体力或意志力的坚强不屈服。
通常指非自愿或被迫忍受各种痛苦、困难或不快，强调受到苦难。
指忍受长期的痛苦或折磨，强调耐心和屈从。多用于否定句和疑问句中。

word_group.brief_definition: 突出, 伸出；引人注目, 杰出, 更突出, 更重要, 清晰地显出
是…的缩写, 代表, 表示；拒绝忍受, 拒绝容忍；支持；逐渐靠岸
起立；放鸽子, 背约；经验证属实, 站得住脚
单口喜剧；独角喜剧；脱口秀；栋笃笑
进入战备状态准备迎敌
勇敢地面对；抵抗；顶得住；经得起
置身事外以更客观地观察

bilingual.source: Learn to stand like a tree, a mountain, and more!
bilingual.target: 学习像树、山一样站立，等等！

bilingual.source: The puppy learned to stand on two legs.
bilingual.target: 小狗学会了用两条腿站立。

bilingual.source: He can stand on one leg for a long time.
bilingual.target: 他可以单腿站立很长时间。

bilingual.source: The foal is learning to stand on its own.
bilingual.target: 这只小马驹正在学习独立站立。

bilingual.source: Flamingos often stand on one leg while resting.
bilingual.target: 火烈鸟休息时经常单腿站立。

bilingual.source: Please stand up when the national anthem is played.
bilingual.target: 当国歌播放时，请站立起来。

bilingual.source: The teacher asked the students to stand in a line.
bilingual.target: 老师要求学生们排成一排站立。

bilingual.source: She couldn't stand still because she was so excited.
bilingual.target: 她因为太兴奋而无法静静站立。

bilingual.source: After the marathon, she felt too feeble to stand.
bilingual.target: 马拉松赛后，她感到太虚弱而无法站立。

bilingual.source: The drillmaster taught us how to stand and walk properly.
bilingual.target: 教官教我们如何正确地站立和行走。

list.abstract: 英文单词：n.停止，抵抗的状态，立场，立足点，看台，架子，台v.站，立，站起，（使）竖立，（使）位于，维持不变，持久，经受；歌曲名 。v，过去式为stood
《Stand》是一首由Jewel演唱的英文歌曲。收录于Atlantic公司2003年6月3日发行的专辑《0304》中。

yingyinNormal.en: You tell your men to stand down. Stand down.
yingyinNormal.zh: 让你的手下把枪放下把枪放下。

yingyinNormal.en: I just want to stand by my girl.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我只是想在我闺蜜身旁守护她。

yingyinNormal.en: Only together, can we stand a chance.
yingyinNormal.zh: 只有团结一致，我们才有一线生机。

yingyinNormal.en: So I'm gonna stand out in my program.
yingyinNormal.zh: 所以我会开始接受培训。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, I guess we know where you stand.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好吧，我们知道你的立场了。

yingyinNormal.en: So stand. Out wit the platinum bastard.
yingyinNormal.zh: 所以挺身而出吧，用智慧打败这金属混蛋。

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah, but the G doesn't stand for 'Gina.
yingyinNormal.zh: 对，她说的可不是下"体"的体哦。

yingyinNormal.en: You missed the moment to stand by your girl.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你已经错过了守护你闺蜜的机会。

yingyinNormal.en: No one can stand against the darkness alone.
yingyinNormal.zh: 没有人能独自抵挡黑暗。

yingyinNormal.en: So, yes, I stand by my Bear Stearns optimism.
yingyinNormal.zh: 对，我坚持贝尔斯通的乐观。

yingyinNormal.en: I do not speak for the Empire. We stand apart.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我与他们不是一路人。

yingyinNormal.en: Jackie? I stand by the rest of the leadership.
yingyinNormal.zh: 杰姬，我支持党内的决定。

yingyinNormal.en: Then, as I stand, I see two uniforms. The cops.
yingyinNormal.zh: 站起来之后，我看到两个穿制服的人，是警察。

yingyinNormal.en: If you couldn't stand them, why are you crying?
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果你不喜欢他们，你哭什么？

yingyinNormal.en: Why did you invite him? I can't stand that guy!
yingyinNormal.zh: 为什么你要邀请他？我无法忍受那个男的！

yingyinNormal.en: You need to learn how to stand up for yourself.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你得学会站起来维护自己。

yingyinNormal.en: Do you really think the board will stand for this?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你真的认为董事会会容忍你的所作所为吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Now line up right there. Stand up straight! Straighter.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在那边排好队！站直了！再直一点！

yingyinNormal.en: Leonard, where do you stand on the anthropic principle?
yingyinNormal.zh: 莱纳德，你同不同意人择原理?

yingyinNormal.en: They will. And they'll fight. We have to stand together.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他们会的，而且他们会战斗，我们必须同心协力。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 滞留; 停滞; 停止

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 地位；级别；名望；持续时间；经历时间；马厩；牛棚；名次表
n. 击球姿势；姿态；街边市场；货摊；摊位；出租汽车停车处；岩架；立足点；立脚处；立场

word_family.mean: v. 站立；站；坐落于；位于；处于特定状态；抵挡；抵御；当候选人；参加竞选；担任…裁判员；请…吃喝；为…付账

examination_example.sentence: Next time you talk with someone who takes a <highlight>stand</highlight>, ask them to give you a reason for their view.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 下次你和持有某立场的人谈话时，请他们为自己的观点说出一个理由。

examination_example.sentence: Their analysis ruled out the possibility that it was firms' political influence, rather than their CSR <highlight>stand</highlight>, that accounted for the leniency.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们的分析排除了一种可能性，即是企业的政治影响力，而不是企业社会责任立场，导致了宽大处理。

examination_example.sentence: In so doing they give composure to a segment of the inarticulate environment in which they take their <highlight>stand</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 通过这种做法，（花园）就将宁静赋予了它们立足的那片沉默无言的环境。

sense_info_list.en: be in or take an upright position on the feet

examination_example.sentence: On average, participants who followed this instruction felt better than those who had been told to <highlight>stand</highlight> or sit in silence.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 平均而言，遵循这一指示的参与者比那些被要求安静地站着或坐着的参与者感觉更好。

examination_example.sentence: There's much to be gained from talking to the stranger <highlight>standing</highlight> by you.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 和站在你身边的陌生人交谈会有很多收获。

examination_example.sentence: History from below <highlight>stood</highlight> alongside biographies of great men.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 下层人物的历史和伟人传记并存。

examination_example.sentence: As such, it needed to appreciate the economic realities, the social contexts and power relations in which each epoch <highlight>stood</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 因此，它需要理解每个时代所处的经济现实、社会背景和权力关系。

examination_example.sentence: The stockbroker is used to <highlight>stand</highlight> for rail travelers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 股票经纪人被用来代表铁路旅客。

examination_example.sentence: The Boyle Family, on the other hand, <highlight>stand</highlight> for its dirty, urban aspect.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 另一方面，Boyle家族则代表着其肮脏的城市面貌。

examination_example.sentence: But embarrassing scandals and the popularity of the republican left in the recent Euro-elections have forced him to eat his words and <highlight>stand</highlight> down.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但是，令人尴尬的丑闻和党左翼在最近欧洲选举中的支持率迫使他食言并退位了。

examination_example.sentence: Therefore, everyone needs to find their extra — their unique value contribution that makes them <highlight>stand</highlight> out in whatever is their field of employment.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 因此，每个人都需要找到他们额外的、独特的价值贡献，使他们在自己的行业领域脱颖而出。

examination_example.sentence: College loan balances in the U.S. now <highlight>stand</highlight> at a record $1.5 trillion, according to the Federal Reserve.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 美国联邦储备委员会的数据显示，目前美国大学贷款余额高达创纪录的1.5万亿美元。

examination_example.sentence: As the hacking trial concludes — finding his predecessor, Rebekah Brooks, innocent of the same charge — the wider issue of dearth of integrity still <highlight>stands</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 窃听案审判判决他的前任Rebekah Brooks该项罪名不成立。就像审判得出的结论，更广泛的诚信缺失问题仍然存在。

sense_info_list.en: a halt for defense or resistance
a stall or booth often outdoors for a small business

sense_info_list.zh: 滞留; 停滞; 停止

word_usage.usage:
表示“立场，态度”
stand指公开表明的坚定看法。
position尤指政府、政党、当权者对某一事件、问题等的意见。
attitude指对某人或某事物的一般看法。
stand通常与副词或介词短语连用，表示站的地方或方式，但有时也与另一短语或从句连用，表明站着时在做某事。如：He stood and looked out to sea.他站着向大海望去。

表示“站起来”
stand通常指“站立、直立”，但亦含“站起来、起来”之义。
stand up用于上述两种意思均可，多指从坐着的姿势，尤指从椅子上站起来，主要用于指让某人站起来或某人只得站着（如没地方坐）。
get up 是多指从坐着、跪着或躺着的姿势站起来、起立、起身。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 忍受，常可与bear换用，指对苦难、疼痛、不幸、损失的忍受，多用于否定句。
忍受，常可与stand换用，指对苦难、疼痛、不幸、损失的忍受，多用于否定句。
忍受，比bear, stand更正式，多用于否定句。
容忍，指对人或行为的容忍，不指对苦难的忍受。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 坚持; 认为; 立场; 态度

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 击球姿势；姿态；街边市场；货摊；摊位；出租汽车停车处；岩架；立足点；立脚处；立场

word_family.mean: v. 站立；站；坐落于；位于；处于特定状态；抵挡；抵御；当候选人；参加竞选；担任…裁判员；请…吃喝；为…付账

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 突出；伸出；引人注目；杰出；更突出；更重要；清晰地显出

sense_info_list.zh: 坚持; 认为; 立场; 态度

examination_example.sentence: In 1937, shortly before he would have had to take a <highlight>stand</highlight> in the conflict that consumed a world that he had, in part, created.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 1937年，就在他不得不在这场冲突中表明立场之前不久，这场冲突在一定程度上消耗了他创造的世界。

sense_info_list.en: be in or take an upright position on the feet

examination_example.sentence: Hundreds of tourists and Parisians <highlight>stood</highlight> and watched the flames leaping from the roof.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 数百名游客和巴黎人站在那里，看着火焰从屋顶上滚落。

sense_info_list.en: a structure containing rows of seats for spectators of a sport or spectacle
a stall or booth often outdoors for a small business

word_usage.usage: stand作动词的基本意思是“站立”，站稳可直接用stand firm。

stand作动词表“忍受”时，是及物动词，可接名词或动名词作宾语。动名词表达的动作有被动意义时，须用动名词的被动形式。
他无法忍受别人如此对待他。
误 He can't stand treating like that.
正 He can't stand being treated like that.

exam_freq_info.chinese: 坚持; 认为; 立场; 态度

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 地位；级别；名望；持续时间；经历时间；马厩；牛棚；名次表

word_family.mean: v. 站立；站；坐落于；位于；处于特定状态；抵挡；抵御；当候选人；参加竞选；担任…裁判员；请…吃喝；为…付账

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 突出；伸出；引人注目；杰出；更突出；更重要；清晰地显出

sense_info_list.en: be in or take an upright position on the feet

examination_example.sentence: For instance, you can move a TV to the kitchen and watch your favorite shows while you're <highlight>standing</highlight> at the sink.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 例如，你可以把电视移到厨房，站在水槽边看你最喜欢的节目。

examination_example.sentence: 5 meters high from a <highlight>standing</highlight> position.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 离站立位置5米高。

examination_example.sentence: We have John <highlight>standing</highlight> by the time clock, and he swears he saw nothing irregular.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们让约翰站在时钟旁边，他发誓他没有看到任何异常。

sense_info_list.zh: 坚持; 认为; 立场; 态度

sense_info_list.en: a stall or booth often outdoors for a small business

examination_example.sentence: You're at a movie theater food <highlight>stand</highlight> loading up on snacks.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你在电影院的食品摊上装零食。

examination_example.sentence: The long midday meal shrinks to whatever could be stuffed into a lunch bucket or bought at a food <highlight>stand</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 漫长的午餐缩减到一个午餐桶内或在食品摊上买到的任何玩意儿。

examination_example.sentence: Four traits <highlight>stood</highlight> out for those that achieved their goals, the researchers report in Public Understanding of Science.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 研究人员在《公众对科学的理解》杂志上报道说，那些达成目标的人有四个突出的特征。

examination_example.sentence: Our students—Asian, Latino, African American, Native American, and, yes, white—<highlight>stand</highlight> to gain from a multicultural curriculum.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们的学生——亚洲人、拉丁美洲人、非洲裔美国人、美国土著人，是的，还有白人——将从多元文化课程中获益。

examination_example.sentence: Every brick he cleaned on a house <highlight>stood</highlight> out like a red jewel in a white setting.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他在房子上清理的每一块砖都像白色背景下的红色宝石一样突出。

word_usage.usage:
stand作动词表“忍受”时，是及物动词，可接名词或动名词作宾语。动名词表达的动作有被动意义时，须用动名词的被动形式。
他无法忍受别人如此对待他。
误 He can't stand treating like that.
正 He can't stand being treated like that.
stand作动词的基本意思是“站立”，站稳可直接用stand firm。

exam_freq_info.chinese: (stand-up)(喜剧)单人表演的; 单口的
(The Stand)末日逼近(史蒂芬·金所著科幻小说)

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 地位；级别；名望；持续时间；经历时间；马厩；牛棚；名次表

word_family.mean: v. 站立；站；坐落于；位于；处于特定状态；抵挡；抵御；当候选人；参加竞选；担任…裁判员；请…吃喝；为…付账

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 是…的缩写；代表；表示；拒绝忍受；拒绝容忍；支持；逐渐靠岸

examination_example.sentence: People have been siting there and <highlight>standing</highlight> there and taking pictures of each other.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 人们一直坐在那里，站在那里，互相拍照。

examination_example.sentence: I count twelve shades of green from where I <highlight>stand</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我从我所处的位置数出了十二种绿色。

examination_example.sentence: Imagine a child <highlight>standing</highlight> on a diving board four feet high and asking himself the question: "Should I jump?"
examination_example.sentence_trans: 想象一下，一个孩子站在四英尺高的跳板上，问自己这样一个问题：“我应该跳吗？”

examination_example.sentence: For example, "bridge" might <highlight>stand</highlight> for "meet" and "out" might <highlight>stand</highlight> for "me."
examination_example.sentence_trans: 例如，“桥”可能代表“见面”，而“出去”可能代表“我”。

examination_example.sentence: Another way to hide a message is to use symbols to <highlight>stand</highlight> for specific letters of the alphabet.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 另一种隐藏信息的方法是使用符号来代表字母表中的特定字母。

examination_example.sentence: With a code book, you might write down words that would <highlight>stand</highlight> for other words.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有了代码本，你可以写下代表其他单词的单词。

examination_example.sentence: It doesn't have to be big, but I can't <highlight>stand</highlight> noise at bedtime.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它不需要很大，但我不能忍受睡觉时的噪音。

examination_example.sentence: At the Chinese art festival, there are different <highlight>stands</highlight> where artists demonstrate their skills and teach the visitors.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在中国艺术节上，有不同的展台，艺术家们在那里展示他们的技能，并教授参观者。

examination_example.sentence: I homed in, with uncertainty, on one particular table at the Brown's Grove Farm's <highlight>stand</highlight>, full of tomatoes the size of my fist.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我不确定地回到布朗格罗夫农场摊位上的一张桌子上，桌上摆满了拳头大小的西红柿。

examination_example.sentence: When the studio didn't want me for the film, he <highlight>stood</highlight> up for me.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当制片厂不想让我拍这部电影时，他站出来支持我。

examination_example.sentence: I was turning the page to get ready for the next page, but the wind caused the pages to fall off the <highlight>stand</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我正在准备翻下一页，但风把谱页从架子上吹下来了。

sense_info_list.zh: (stand-up)(喜剧)单人表演的; 单口的

examination_example.sentence: He's the funniest <highlight>stand</highlight>-up comedian on the comedy scene.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他是喜剧界最滑稽的单口喜剧演员。

sense_info_list.zh: (The Stand)末日逼近(史蒂芬·金所著科幻小说)

exam_freq_info.chinese: (stand out)显眼; 突出; 出色
坚持; 认为; 立场; 态度

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 地位；级别；名望；持续时间；经历时间；马厩；牛棚；名次表

word_family.mean: v. 站立；站；坐落于；位于；处于特定状态；抵挡；抵御；当候选人；参加竞选；担任…裁判员；请…吃喝；为…付账

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 突出；伸出；引人注目；杰出；更突出；更重要；清晰地显出
是…的缩写；代表；表示；拒绝忍受；拒绝容忍；支持；逐渐靠岸
起立；放鸽子；背约；经验证属实；站得住脚
单口喜剧；独角喜剧；脱口秀；栋笃笑

sense_info_list.en: be in or take an upright position on the feet

examination_example.sentence: Today, when I <highlight>stand</highlight> in that field which was once empty, I see trees about as tall as I am.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 今天，当我站在那片曾空无一人的田野上时，我看到了和我一样高的树。

examination_example.sentence: For example, some people believe that chopsticks should not be left <highlight>standing</highlight> upright in a bowl.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 例如，有些人认为筷子不该保持直立在碗中。

examination_example.sentence: My mother often says, "<highlight>Stand</highlight> tall like the sunflower and be proud of who you are."
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我妈妈常说：“要像向日葵一样挺立，并为自己感到骄傲。”

examination_example.sentence: They <highlight>stand</highlight> for happiness and good luck in China.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在中国，它们代表幸福和好运。

examination_example.sentence: I also like purple because it <highlight>stands</highlight> for mystery.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我也喜欢紫色，因为它代表神秘。

examination_example.sentence: The Tang Costume <highlight>stands</highlight> for Chinese history and fashion culture.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 唐装代表着中国的历史和时尚文化。

examination_example.sentence: The hurt and pain of the two situations were more than Jack could <highlight>stand</highlight>, and he turned to alcohol (酒精) for help.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这两种情况的伤害和痛苦让杰克无法忍受，于是他向酒精求助。

examination_example.sentence: I can't <highlight>stand</highlight> the sight of blood, so I could never do what he does!
examination_example.sentence_trans: 看到一滴血我都无法忍受，所以我永远做不到他做的事！

examination_example.sentence: Besides the darkness, the plants can't <highlight>stand</highlight> the cold.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 除了黑暗，植物还受不了寒冷。

sense_info_list.en: a stall or booth often outdoors for a small business

examination_example.sentence: With the help of her mother, Jane set up her first lemonade <highlight>stand</highlight> (摊档).
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在母亲的帮助下，简c开办了她的第一个柠檬水摊档。

examination_example.sentence: Luckily I found a repairing <highlight>stand</highlight> (修车摊) across from the street.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 幸运的是，我在街对面找到了一个修车摊。

examination_example.sentence: Charles Feltman, a German, started the first Coney Island hot dog <highlight>stand</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 查尔斯·费尔特曼，一个德国人，在康尼岛上开了第一家热狗摊。

sense_info_list.zh: (stand out)显眼; 突出; 出色

examination_example.sentence: As common people, the medical workers choose to <highlight>stand</highlight> out and protect others without thinking twice.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 作为普通人，医务工作者毫不犹豫地决定挺身而出，保护他人。

examination_example.sentence: A middle school in Wuhan has <highlight>stood</highlight> out among other schools in students' love and care for their parents.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在学生对父母的爱和关心方面，武汉的一所中学从其他学校中脱颖而出。

examination_example.sentence: I wanted to <highlight>stand</highlight> out in a crowd.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我想在人群中引人注目。

examination_example.sentence: It <highlight>stands</highlight> at 1.8m tall and weighs 101 kg.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它身高1.8米，体重101公斤。

examination_example.sentence: This robot <highlight>stands</highlight> at 1m tall and looks like a container with arms.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这个机器人身高1米，看起来像一个有手臂的集装箱。

examination_example.sentence: Stir and let <highlight>stand</highlight> 1 minute.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 搅拌并静置 1 分钟。

examination_example.sentence: lf you are a huge fan of <highlight>stand</highlight>-up comedy (脱口秀), you'll have an amazing afternoon at EZ Comedy Club!
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你是单口喜剧的超级粉丝，你将在EZ喜剧俱乐部度过一个美妙的下午！

sense_info_list.zh: 坚持; 认为; 立场; 态度

word_usage.usage: stand作动词的基本意思是“站立”，站稳可直接用stand firm。

stand作动词表“忍受”时，是及物动词，可接名词或动名词作宾语。动名词表达的动作有被动意义时，须用动名词的被动形式。
他无法忍受别人如此对待他。
误 He can't stand treating like that.
正 He can't stand being treated like that.

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 口语用词，常可与bear换用，但stand侧重指经受得起，bear强调容忍，是普通用语。
普通用词，指忍受饥饿、寒冷、疼痛、不幸、困难、侮辱等，多强调忍受者的勇敢和坚毅。
表示非高形物体位于某处，如地区、国家、河流、田野、铁路等。
可用来表示高形物体位于某处，如：建筑、树、人等。
